item.title: Virtio and Vhost Architecture - Part 2
item.description: This post explains overheads of virtio, and introduce vhost that increases performance of virtio.

item.title: Virtio and Vhost Architecture - Part 1
item.description: This post explains virtio and vhost, device virtualization techniques used in Linux kernel virtual machine (KVM).
